hl.seg: Avoiding dieting to prevent from flu.

doc.seg: This research of American scientists came in front after experimenting on mice.
Experiments proved that mice on a lower calorie diet had comparatively less ability to fight the flu virus.
Research disproved the old axiom that " It is better to fast during fever"
According to scientists, eat a lot during fever.

Researchers of the Michigan State University say that mice getting diet food were found to have very less ability to fight the infection and their chances of death also increased. On the other hand, mice getting regular diet had more energy against the flu virus
Professor Elizabeth Gardner said that those who are dieting are not only sooner affected by the flu, but also take longer to recover.
She also said that those who have taken flu vaccines should also avoid dieting for a few months during the winter.

hl.seg: First nuclear test was done in 1990

doc.seg: Thomas Reid, who worked in the Leur National Laboratory as a weapon designer had written this book with the help of Los Alamos National Laboratory's former Technical Intelligence Director, Danny Staleman.

Thomas Reid said that due to many factors, he is certain that China tested Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Among the factors are the design of the bomb, and information he gathered from Chinese scientists.
He further added that that was the reason that Pakistan was able to reply to India's Nuclear test with a nuclear test in just 2 weeks and 3 days.
Thomas Reid reminded that in 1961, Russia suddenly performed a nuclear test, in response to which America took 17 days to preform a test, despite having this bomb for a long time.
He further said that in May 1998, the atom bomb that Pakistan tested was made with a lot of care and Pakistani scientists were completely trusted for it.
When Thomas Reed was asked this question that China supplied atomic technology to Pakistan so he said in his answer that India is a mutual enemy of Pakistan and China.
He said that its evidence is also present that Dr. Abdul Qadir Khan has used the Chinese model. Later the documents received from Libya also confirm this.
Another question that is it common to do nuclear experiments mutually. Then he said that Anees Sonway openly performed a nuclear experiment in the desert of Nevada for Britain.
He said that we also predict that Israel also has access to the results of this experiment.
Thomas Reeds was also asked if China is continuing nuclear proliferation?
On this Thomas Reeds said that China has been supplying raw material, instructions and the design to a nuclear facility of Iran in its city Asfahan.
Apart from this, China has also provided Iran with an enrichment plant in Kheeraj.
He said that China had been providing nuclear technology to Iran, Rome, Pakistan, Egypt, Libya and Yemen via North Korea.

To settle with this, consumer has to use Microsoft's page 'MS08067'.
Microsoft says that virus which affects thousands of computers, searches for windows file 'services.exe' and adds itself into its code.
After that virus makes itself into a DLL file into system folder of windows.
This virus creates its file name too.
Then changes the details of the registry of windows.
This virus creates a problem after it gets active which comes out as 'HTTP Server' and changes the restore point of the machine.
After that it download files from the hackers website.
Microsoft has to say that this virus has affected computers in different countries.

hl.seg: Tea: Effective cure of Chest Cancer

doc.seg: In a new research it is being told that drinking 3 cups of tea everyday
reduces the danger of chest cancer in women under 50 years of age by 1/3rd.
The research happening in the Moffitt Cancer Center in the American State of Florida, has showed that chances of getting tumor of chest cancer in those women under 50 years of age
is reduced by 37%, who drink at least three cups of tea everyday.
It is also told in the research that it does not help older women even if they drink three or more cups of tea daily.
Specialists think that this is because of the presence of such components in tea that are more effective against such types of cancer tumors, which usually targets women under 50 years of age.
Research was done on 5000 women who had treatment done for Chest Cancer at Moffitt Cancer Center founded in city Tampa of State of Florida.
Their ages are between 20 and 74 years.
Specialists compared their medical records and lifestyle to those women who are free from chest cancer.
Specialists also came to know that tea had its prominent effect on one of the kinds of cancer, Lobes, and it was reduced by 66%.
Every 10th chest cancer patient has this kind of cancer.
This type of chest cancer is dangerous because it is deep inside and usually diagnosed when it has spread alot.
Specialists say that having at least three cups of tea every day can readily reduce the chances of chest cancer in women of lesser age.
They say that incorporating tea as a regular drink in your daily routine helps create immunity against the cancer.
Almost 40,000 women are diagnosed with chest cancer in Britain.
